column2: Burundi-Covid: Prezida yasavye abanyeshure bose kwipimisha imbere yo gusubira mu mashure
column3: Abanyeshure bose biga mu bigo vy'amashure y'uburaro mu Burundi kuva kuri uyu wa gatanu baripimisha coronavirus  mu mwiteguro wo gusubira ku mashure ku wa mbere, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ubushikiranganji bujejjwe amagara y'abantu. Iryo sekeza ryerekeye abanyeshure bashika 30.000, abigisha babo n'abasanzwe babakurikirana mu buraro (encadreurs). Umwe wese muri abo ''azotegerezwa kuba afise  urupapuro rwerekana ko yipimishije'' imbere yo kwinjira mu kigo c'ishure ku wa mbere, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Thadee Ndikumana. Iyo ngingo yatangajwe  inyuma y'aho bisabiwe n'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi  Evariste Ndayishimiye. Prezida Evaritse Ndayishimiye yabivugiye mw'ikoraniro ryahuje urwaruka 1500 ruva mu ntara zose z'u Burundi kugira ruvugane ikibazo c'ukurwanya ubukene. Kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka, abandura coronavírus bariyongeye mu Burundi inyuma y'umwaka umwe iyo ndwara ivuzwe muri ico gihugu. Abitavye iryo koraniro bamwe bagaragara mu mafoto bafise  udufukamunwa n'ubwo hari abatwambaye mw'izosi,  ariko hari n'abatatwambaye. Prezida w'Uburundi yabwiye abitavye ikoraniro ati: ''Ndasavye y'uko mu gusubira mu mashure yanyu mwese mwogenda mwipimishije kugira mumenye ko mufise amagara meza kugira ntimuzoshike mwanduza abandi". Umukuru w'u Burundi  yavuze ko ashaka kwirinda ivyashitse igihe c'inyuma y'uburuhuko bwa Noel. Yagize ati: "Mwarabonye mu kiruhuko ca Noweli ingene vyabagendeye. Benshi bagiye banduye bashika banduza abandi babana mu mashure." Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko yamaze kubwira umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu  gutegura isekeza ryo gupima abanyeshure bose b'amashure yisumbuye imbere y'uko basubira ku mashure. Amashure mu Burundi azokwugurura icese ku wa mbere 12/4/2021 inyuma y'uburuhuko bwa Pasika. Ingingo zo kwirinda zimwe zubahirizwa nabi nabi Mu ntango z'uwu mwaka, abandura umugera wa coronavírus bariyongeye cane mu Burundi ugereranije n'imbere yaho bituma igihugu gikaza ingingo zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Gushika ubu winjira mu Burundi ari uko ugiye n'indege gusa, ariko iminsi yo gushika ushirwa ukwa wenyene mw'ihoteri iherutse kugabanywa iva kuri ndwi ishirwa kuri ine gusa. Izindi ngingo nko kwambara agafukamunwa  canke kwirinda kwegerana zubahirizwa nabi nabi. Gushika ubu kandi reta y'u Burundi nta gahunda ifise yo guha incanco za coronavírus abanyagihugu. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yatangaje ko reta y'u Burundi yahisemwo kuba  irarindiriye, ivuga ko incanco ziriko zirakoreshwa gushika ubu  zitaremezwa burundu ko ata ngaruka mbi zishobora gutera ku magara y'abazihawe. Ku biharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, mu  Burundi abamaze kwandura umugera wa corona ni ibihumbi 3.017 na 6 gusa umaze kwica. Abamaze kwandura no gupfa bashobora kuba barenga aho cane kuko  hatangazwa ibitgiri vy'abaciye  mu bigo vyo gupima canke kuvura bizwi icese.

column2: Impunzi z’Abarundi muri Tanzania ‘zibwirwa ko zishobora guhungurwa ku nguvu’
column3: Impunzi z'abarundi ziri muri Tanzaniya zivuga ko zabwiwe ko hari umugambi wo kuzihungura ku nguvu, kandi zitizeye umutekano mu gihe zosubizwa mu Burundi. Bamwe mu mpunzi zo mu nkambi ya Nyarugusu iri mu ntara ya Kigoma babwiye BBC ko bakoreshejwe inama n'umukuru w'ikambi ku wa 04 z'uku kwezi kw'indwi akababwira ko ata kamaro ko kuguma mu buhungiro kuko mu Burundi ari amahoro. Ishirahamwe rijejwe impunzi  kw'isi rivuga ko Tanzania ihaye indaro impunzi zirenga 200 000 z'abarundi. Aba bagizwe ahanini n'abahunze uruhagarara rwo mu 2015 mu Burundi. Mu majwi yafatiwe muri iyi nama mw'ikambi ya Nyarugusu, umuyobozi w'iyi kambi, Jumanne Singani, yumvikana avuga ko izi mpunzi zatumye umutekano w'abanyagihugu ba Tanzaniya uhungabana, ku buryo batinya n'ugufata ingendo. Yibutsa izi mpunzi ko hariho inyishu zitatu ku kibazo c'impunzi: guhunguka ku gushaka kwabo, guhabwa ubwenegihugu canke kurondererwa ubuhungiro mu kindi gihugu. Muri buno buryo butatu, Bwana Singani yababwiye ko inyishu ku mpunzi z'Abarundi ziri muri Tanzaniya ubu ari uko zitegerezwa guhunguka. Yavuze ati: "Turavye ingene ibintu bimeze ubu, ikiriho ni uko muhunguka kuko mu Burundi amahoro arasasagaye". Yabwiye impunzi kandi ko hari n'uburyo butatu bwo guhunguka. Ati:"Ubwa mbere ni guhunguka ku gushaka kwanyu, ubwa kabiri guhunguka muhimirijwe (promoted repatriation), ubwa gatatu guhunguka hakoreshejwe inguvu". Bwana Singani yumvikana abwira izi mpunzi z'abarundi ko vyoba vyiza bahungutse ku gushaka kwabo, batarindiriye ko hakoreshwa inguvu. Mu 2012, impunzi z'Abarundi zari mw'ikambi ya Mtabila iri muri District ya Kasulu intara ya Kigoma, barahunguwe ku nguvu. Uyu muyobozi w'ikambi yabwiye impunzi ko ingingo yo kubahungura yafashwe inyuma y'inama yahuje abategetsi ba Tanzaniya, b'Uburundi n'ishirahamwe HCR rijejwe impunzi. Tumubajije kuri ibi yabwiye impunzi, Bwana Singani yabwiye BBC ko ataco yobivugako, adusaba kuvugisha abakoresha biwe, ubushinkiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ari nabwo bujejwe impunzi muri Tanzania. Umwe mu mpunzi atashatse gutangazwa, avuga ko bama baterwa ubwoba iyo bariko basabwa gutahuka, mu "gufatira ku vyabaye mu 2012 ku mpunzi zari mw'ikambi ya Mtabila, no ku mpunzi z'abanyarwanda muri Kagera (1996)". Ati: "Iyo badukoranije mu manama, nta bindi batwibutsa atari ivyo, kuko basanze umengo ni akanyegeri gahonyowe ntihagire ikintu na kimwe gikorwa". Asaba amakungu ko amategeko agenga impunzi yokurikizwa bagakingirwa. Kuri ibi vyabwiwe izi mpunzi, ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati muri Tanzaniya buvuga ko ata mugambi leta y'ico gihugu ifise wo kubahungura ku nguvu. Umupfasoni Christina Mwangosi, umuvugizi mfatakibanza w'ubwo bushikiranganji yabwiye BBC ati: "Leta ya Tanzaniya ifasha impunzi ziyandikishije gusubira mu bihugu vyabo. "Nico conyene gikorwa na leta ya Tanzaniya, igihari ni uko impunzi zihunguka ku gushaka kwazo". Impunzi z'Abarundi muri Tanzania ziba mu makambi ya Nyarugusu mu karere ka Kasulu, Nduta na Mtendeli mu karere ka Kibondo, ni mu ntara ya Kigoma.

column2: Francine Niyonsaba ntazoja mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu yo kwinonora imitsi yimirije
column3: Peres Jepchirchir  yatahukanye ihiganwa rya Olempike mu kwiruka marathon ku ruhande rw’abagore, hamwe na Francine Niyonsaba ntibazoja mw’ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ryo kunonora imitsi (World Athletics Championships) muri kuno kwezi. Uyu munya-Kenya Jepchirchir yarahinyagaye mu mafyigo, na yo umurundikazi Niyonsaba yagize ikibazo mu kuguru. Jepchirchir yabwiye ikinyamakuru co muri Kenya The Nation ati: "Ndababara mu mafyigo no mu kuguru kwose”. Niyonsaba, umunonotsi yatahukanye umudari w’ifeza mw’ihiganwa rya Olempike mu gusiganwa ku metero 800 mu 2016, yimuriwe ku ntera za 5000 na 10000. Uyu murundikazi w’imyaka 29 yabujijwe kwiruka kuri izi ntera 800 yari amenyereye mu 2019 kubera ikibazo c’imisemburo ya testosterone iri ku rugero rwo hejuru. Jepchirchir w’imyaka 28, yaratahukanye umudari w’inzahabu i Tokyo mu mwaka uheze mu kwiruka ku mwanya w’amasaha abiri n’iminota 27 n’amasegonda 20, atsinda mugenziwe Brigid Kosgei n’umunyamerikakazi Molly Seidel. Uyu munonotsi yatsindiye amahiganwa mpuzamakungu ya marathon ku ruhande rw’abagore mu 2016 na 2020 yongerako ati: "Ndababaye cane ariko sinohava nunyura imvune na rirya tugifise irindi higanwa mu mwaka uza imbere y’uko nja kurwanira intsinzi yanje ya Olempike mu 2024 mu nkino zizobera i Paris”. Jepchirchir yatsindiye ihiganwa rya mbere rya marathon i Boston mu kwa kane akaba yaratevye gushirwa ku rutonde rw’umurwi w’abakenyakazi bane ba Kenya bazohiganwa muri marathon i Eugene. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Niyonsaba avuga ko ata kundi yari kugira atari ukuva muri iri higanwa rizobera muri Amerika. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram yanditse ati: "Haraciye hafi ukwezi kumwe ntanguye kwumva imvune yo mu kirenge. Jewe n’abo dufashanya twarakoze ibishobora vyose kugira nkire. "Ubu meze neza ariko sinashoboye kwimenyereza muri iki kiringo cose, rero uko meze ubu sinumva ko vyonshobokera guhiganwa uko ndavyipfuza”. Niyonsaba, Umurundikazi wenyene amaze gutsindira umudari wa Olempike, yarakoze birashimwa mw’ihiganwa Diamond League ryabereye i Doha mu kwa gatanu, aho yiruka imetero 3000. Mu mahiganwa ya Olempike y’umwaka uheze, yahejeje ari mu kibanza ca gatanu ku metero 10000 ku ruhande rw’abagore, akaba yaciye umuhigo, kuko yari ahejeje guhindura intera ahiganwako inyuma yo kubuzwa guhiganwa hagati y’imetero 400 na 1500 kubera imisemburo ya testosterone irenze urugero. Aya mahiganwa mpuzamakungu yo kwinonora imitsi (World Athletics Championships) azotangura ku wa gatanu akazorangira ku wa 21 Mukakaro (7).

column2: Afghanistan: Impunzi zizotahira he inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi?
column3: Ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bariko barahunga Afghanistan kuva aho aba Taliban bigaruriye ubutegetsi, inyuma y'imyaka hafi 20 babwomoweko n'ingabo mpuzamakungu zirongowe na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ibi bitigiri biguma biduga vy'abantu barondera kuva mu gihugu, vyiyongera ku miriyoni 2.2 z'izindi mpunzi zari zisanzwe ziba mu bihugu bibanyi, hamwe n'abanyagihugu imiriyoni 3.5 bahungiye hagati mu gihugu kubera indyane zibandanya hamwe n'imidugararo ishingiye kuri poritike. Muri kino gihe, igitigiri ntikiratomoka neza. Aba Taliban bagenzura imihora yose ijana mu bihugu bibanyi, kandi bakavuga ko badakeneye ko abanya-Afghanistan bava mu gihugu. Amakuru avuga ko abadandaza canke abafise impapuro z'inzira ari bo bonyene bemerewe kujabuka. Ku wa gatanu, umuvugizi w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe impunzi kw'isi (UNHCR) yavuze ati: "Abenshi mu ba nya Afghanistan ntibashobora kuva mu gihugu mu nzira zizwi. Gushika uno musi, abantu bashobora kuba bageramiwe nta buryo bafise bwo kuva mu gihugu". Ariko n'aho bimeze uko, hari impunzi zimwe zashoboye kuronka inzira zo kuva mu gihugu. Abanya-Afghanistan baharurwa mu bihumbi bavugwa ko bashoboye guhungira muri Pakistan haciye akanya gato aba Taliban bigaruriye Kabul, mu gihe abababa 1500 nabo bavugwa ko binjiye muri Uzbekistan, ubu bakaba baba mu mahema hafi y'urubibe. I Kabul, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyagihugu babandanya bisuka ku kibuga c'indege mpuzamakungu - muri kino gihe kikaba ari co conyene kiriko kirakora - mu kugerageza kurondera ingene bohunga. Ku wa Mungu, umutegetsi wo mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika (Maison Blanche/White House) yavuze ko Amerika n'incuti zayo gushika ico gihe bashoboye kuvana i Kabul abarenga 30.000 kuva ku wa 14 z'uku kwezi kwa munani, n'aho muri bo igitigiri c'abanya-Afghanistan kitazwi neza. Ibitigiri vy'abanya Afghanistan bariko barahunga muri kino gihe biri mu bitigiri binini bidakunze kuboneka vy'abarondera ubuhungiro bava muri kino gihugu kimaze imyaka itari mike carasinzikajwe n'umutekano muke n'indyane. N'imbere y'uko aba Taliban basubira kwigarurira ubutegetsi, abantu barenga 550.000 bari bamaze guteshwa izabo muri uno mwaka kubera intambara, nk'uko bivugwa na UNHCR. Ibi bivuga ko hafi Abanya-Afghanistan imiriyoni 3.5 bahungiye hagati mu gihugu. Kuri aba bahungiye hagati muri Afghanistan, hafi imiriyoni 2.2 z'impunzi n'abasaba ubuhungiro bariko bararondera aho bakika umusaya mu bihugu bibanyi mu mpera z'umwaka uheze. Muri uno mwaka, Abanya-Afghanistan barahuye n'ikibazo c'uruzuba rwinshi n'ubukene bw'imfungurwa mu gihugu hafi cose. Icegeranyo casohowe mu kwa gatandatu n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe imfungurwa kw'isi PAM/WFP, kivuga ko abantu imiriyoni 14 - abarenga ica gatatu c'abanyagihugu bose - bari basinzikajwe n'inzara. Mu mwaka uheze, ibihugu bibanyi Pakistan na Iran, ni vyo vyakiriye ibitigiri binini vy'Abanya-Afghanistan b'impunzi n'abarondera ubuhungiro. Hafi abantu imiriyoni 1.5 ni bo bahungiye muri Pakistan mu 2020, mu gihe Iran yakiriye 780.000, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro vya UNHCR. Ubudagi bugira gatatu, n'impunzi zirenga 180.000, mu gihe Turukiya yakiriye hafi 130.000. Turavye ku bitigiri vy'abarondera ubuhungiro - ni ukuvuga abasavye ko bajanwa ahandi ariko bakirindiriye - Turukiya, Ubudagi n'Ubugiriki biza imbere, uko bikurikirana bikaba bifise ibitigiri hafi 125.000, 33.000 na 20.000. N'aho muri Iran ata bariyo barondera ubuhungiro, abasanzwe barahungiyeyo bakaba bafise amakarata y'impunzi bashobora kugira uburenganzira bwo kuvurwa no kwiga muri ico gihugu. N'aho hari ibihugu vyatangaje ko bidashobora kwakira Abanya-Afghanistan bahunga, hari ibindi vyemeye kubaha ubuhungiro, ibi navyo ni: Iran, Pakistan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan, Ubwongereza, Amerika, Canada, Australia,  ibihugu vyo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya (EU/UE), Ubudagi, Ubufaransa, Autriche/Austria, Ubuswisi, Turukiya, North Macedonia, Albania na Kosovo. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, Uganda nayo yaremeye kwakira impunzi z'abanya-Afghanistan 2000, iki gihugu kikaba ari co gifise ibitigiri binini vy'impunzi ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, kikaba kigira gatatu kw'isi.

column2: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi rikomeye kuri uyu mugoroba (19.08.2022)
column3: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta yavuze ko umukinyi w'imbere ku ruhande w'uwo mugwi, Bukaya Saka, yimirije gushira umukono ku masezerano mashasha. Yagize ati:"Mfise icizere kinini ko uruhande rwacu n'urwa Bukayo tuvyumva kumwe - igisigaye n'ukubishira mu nyandiko", (Romano via Arsenal.com) Arteta yavuze kandi ko umugwi wiwe ushaka kwihweza neza abakinyi ufise ubu imbere yo kwiyumvira kugura abandi bashasha mu mwanya usigaye w'igura n'igurishwa. "Ategerezwa kuba umukinyi mwiza, dushaka kuzana umukinyi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru, atari kuba ari umukinyi gusa." Umukinyi wa Real Madrid, Casemiro muri iki gitondo yasezeye abo bahora bakinana muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo kwemera kuja gukinira umugwi wa Manchester United. Umumenyereza wa Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti yemeje mu gitondo ko uwo mukinyi yimirije gusezera ikibuga ca Bernabéu. (Skysport) Umuyobozi mukuru wa Borussia Dortmund Hans-Joachim Watzke yamiriye kure inkuru zivuga ko uwo mugwi ushobora ugura Cristiano Ronaldo. Bivuye ku nkuru z'ikinyamakuru BILD co mu Budagi cavuze ko Dortmund ishobora kuzana uwo mukinyi wa Manchester United. Watzke yagize ati:"Ndamukunda, kuvugisha ukuri n'iciyumviro ciza - kubona Cristiano akinira kuri Signal Iduna Park. Ariko nta masezerano n'amwe dufitaniye, kuri ivyo rero tureke kubandanya tubivuga." (Sky sport football) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Eddie Howe yabwiye Real Madrid ko yokwibagira kugerageza kugura umukinyi Bruno Guimaraes  bivuye ku nkuru zivuga ko bariko baragira inguvu zo kumugura. Uwo munye Brezil w'imyaka 24 yari yaguzwe amapawundi imiliyoni 40 mu kwezi kwa mbere mu mugwi wa Lyon, bamubona nk'uwushobora gusubirira Casemiro ariko arerekeza muri Machester United.

column2: Nigeria: Uyu mupatiri yiyemeje gukingira ibigirwamana vy'aba Igbo biriko biraturirwa
column3: Mu gihe abavugabutumwa bo mw'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu buseruko bwa Nigeria bagenda baturira ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyo muri kahise babona ko ari ibigirwamana, umupatiri umwe w'umukatorika wewe abandanya avyegeranya. Ibi bibumbano bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu madini kama yo muri ako karere kabamwo abo mu bwoko bw'aba Igbo, basanzwe babifata nk'imana zabo kandi bemera ko bifise ubushobozi ndengakamere. Gusa abanywanyi b'aya madini kama bagenda bagabanuka kubera idini rya Gikristu - ahanini rigizwe n'amashengero ya Pentecote - rigenda ryigarurira abatari bake. Abanyamakuru ba BBC Igbo Chiagozie Nwonwu na Karina Igonikon barerekana utwigoro tw'uyu mupatiri two gukingira kahise kariko karatokombera kubera ibikorwa vy'abavugabutumwa bamwe bamwe. N'aho bamwita "umuriro waka", nta kintu giteye ubwoba kuri Patiri Paul Obayi arongoye inzu ndangamurage ishinguwemwo ibigirwamana mu gisagara ca Nnsuka kiri mu buseruko bwa Nigeria. Iyi nzu ndangamurage y'ivyumba bitatu iherereye mu kigo c'Isengero nkuru ya Katorika yitiriwe umweranda Tereza (Saint Theresa), irimwo amajana n'amajana y'ibigirwamana bitandukanye, ikibumbano c'intambwe hamwe n'ibishusho vy'imana z'aba Igbo. Iyo hagize abava inyuma y'izi mana kama, cane cane kubera inyigisho z'amashengero ya Pentecôte bamwe mu bavugabutumwa baca baturira ibi bibumbano, bavuga ko biteye kubiri n'ukwemera gushingiye ku Mana imwe, kandi ko ari "impwemu mbi zitera imikoshi". Rimwe na rimwe, hari n'abemera izo mana kama bo nyene ubwabo bavyituririra bishimikije umugani wo mu migenzo y'aba Igbo uvuga ngo: "Iyo imana ibangamye cane, icika urukwi rwo guturira". Ariko Patiri Obayi wewe yafashe iyindi nzira mu gukingira izo mana n'imanakazi, akavuga ko akoresha ububasha ahabwa n'Imana kugira ngo azake izo nguvu ndengakamere. Ibi vyamutumye bamutazira Okunerere - "umuriro uturira ibigirwamana muri mutima". Ari kuri iyo nzu ndangamurage, yavuze ati: "Naramaze gusambura izi mpwemu". "Iki ubona hano ni ikibarara. Nta kintu na kimwe kirimwo". Patiri Obayi avuga ko ahanini yigiye ku mazu ndangamurage yo mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi biriko biraterwa igitsure kugira ngo bigarukane ibibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni, aho atanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Benin Bronzes/Bronzes du Bénin (ibibumbano vy'ivyuma birenga igihumbi vyari bishashije ingoro y'umwami w'icitwa Ubwami bwa Benin, ari yo Nigeria ya kino gihe). "Naragendeye amazu ndangamurage yo mu burengero nca nsangayo ibi bibumbano, harimwo mbere n'ivyavuye muri Benin, ariho naca nigira inama yo kubibungabunga". Uwurongoye iyi sengero nkuru, Patiri Eugene Odo, arashigikiye aka kigoro kiwe, aho agereranya iyi nzu ndangamurage n'iyindi yegukira Katorika mu Butaliyano. Ati: "I Roma nk'akarorero, hari inzu ndangamurage ibitsemwo ibintu vyahinguwe mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gipagani bw'Abaromani, kandi ingenzi zama zigendera iyo nzu mu ntumbero yo kwiga ingene umuntu yagiye atera imbere". N'aho iyi nzu ndangamurage ibitse ibi bigirwamana yakira ingenzi ziva kure mbere n'i Lagos, irakeneye kugarukirwa. Ibibumbano, bimwe mbere bimaze ibinjana, bisanzaye irya n'ino hasi muri iyo nzu, vyuzuye inkungugu. Hari mbere n'ivyamaze kuribwa n'umuswa. Ibi vyose ni ivyo yegeranije mu "butumwa amaze akora mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20 aho agenda yigisha mu bisagara no mu mitumba itandukanye mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. Ati: "Abantu barandikira isengero ryanje bansaba ko ngenda kubakuriraho ibi bigirwamana bibabujije amahoro". Ni itunga rikomeye ryerekana imana z'aba Igbo z'ubwoko bwinshi. Ariko iyikomeye muri izi zose ni Adaada leja, ikigirwamana cambitswe inkofero y'injishano yasengwa n'abarondera kuvyara. Patiri Obayi avuga ko iyi imaze imyaka hafi 200. Odinani, idini kama ry'aba Igbo, ryariho imbere y'umuzo y'idini rya Gikristu n'ubukoloni.  Ni uburyo bwo guterekera aho abantu basenga umuzimu userukiwe n'igishusho kizwi kw'izina rya chi, kugira ngo ubasabire kuri Rugira Vyose, bita Chukwu. Izindi mana basenga harimwo: Si benshi bagisenga izi mana kama, kandi abenshi barahamwa cane n'abakirisu basanzwe ari na bo benshi. Imisi mikuru yabo irasuzuguritse, kandi n'imigirwa imwe imwe isa no kubandwa ibonwa nabi mbere birashika n'utuzu tw'indaro tugaterwa mu bikorwa bijanye n'ubukristu. Muri kino gihe, abenshi mu bakigendera muri aya madini kama ni abatama, n'aho ubu hari bamwe mu rwaruka bagenda bagarariza ubukristu bagashira imbere imigirwa barazwe n'abakurambere. Chinasa Nwosu, umusenyeri w'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu rusengero rwa Royal Church ruri mu gisagara Port Harcourt kiri mu buseruko, ararwanya bikomeye uku kwemera kama. Musenyeri Nwosu yatanguye kumenyekana mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990 igihe yasambura utuzu tw'indaro, aturira ivyitwa ibigirwamana, anarandura ibiti avuga ko vyari "ibiti vya shetani/satani". Ibi biti, bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivya kera cane, bizungurutswe hasi n'ibitambaro vy'amabara atukura canke yera, bigafatwa nk'ivyeranda ku bayoboke bavyo babisenga bakanabitambira. Hari bimwe usanga biri ku mihana y'abantu ariko vyinshi biri mu mashamba. Ati: "Imana ntishaka ko dusenga ibigirwamana. Idini kama rya Afrika akenshi rishingiye ku gusenga ibigirwamana". Asubiramwo amajambo yo muri Bibiriya, yongerako ati: "Imihezagiro uyironka mu gihe utaye ivyo bintu vyavumwe". Avuga ko ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni mu burengero bwa Nigeria ubu bikaba bibarizwa mu mazu ngandamurage yo mu bihugu vy'uburengero, bitirirwa Imana iyo ari yo yose, akaba ashigikiye ko bigarukanwa mu gihugu. Hagati aho, aragabisha reta ya Nigera ko mu gihe yogarukana ibibumbano bishobora kuba vyaragizwe ibigirwamana, agatanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Ikenga biri mu nzu ndangamurage y'Ubwongereza, ko bikwiye guturirwa. Ibi vyiyumviro birarwanywa bikomeye na Patiri Obayi yiyemeje gukingira ibi bibumbano mu nzu yiwe ndangamurabe. Ati: "Ibi ni ibibumbano abana bacu bazokwigirako kugira ngo batahure neza ingene abakurambere babo bari babayeho".

column2: Pierre Webo : uwa 08/12 uzoba umusi ukomeye mu kurwanya amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba
column3: Pierre Webo, icegera c'umumenyereza w'umurwi Istanbul Basaksehir wa Turukiya, avuga ko igenekerezo rya 08 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri rizoba umusi ukomeye mu rugamba rwo kurwanya amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba. Abakinyi ba Basaksehir na Paris St-Germain baravuye mu kibuga mu rukino rwo mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, inyuma y'aho umuhagarikizi agira kane yagirijwe ko yabwiye Webo amajambo yo kumutyoza kubera ari umwirabure. Webo w'imyaka 38  avuga ko imisi yakurikiye "ari yo yabaye mibi cane" kuri we mu kiringo cose amaze mu mwuga w'umupira w'amaguru. Avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko umuganga amufasha kugira ngo ashobore gusinzira muri rirya joro ivyo biba. Ati: "Imisi ibiri canke itatu yakurikiye  niyo misi yambereye mibi cane mu mwuga wanje". Uyu yahoze ari umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Kameruni yaragirije umuhagarikizi agira kane, Sebastian Coltescu, ko yamututse mu kumuhamagara yisunze ibara y'uruhu rwiwe, aho kumuhamagara mw'izina ryiwe. Webo yabwiye BBC ko kubw'iwe, "igenekerezo rya munani, rifise kahise na kazoza. Tuzikwama turyibuka". Uru rukino rwahagaze ku  munota wa 14 ata murwi n'umwe wari bwinjize igitsindo, rwagiye gusubirwamwo bukeye ku wa gatatu, ruhagarikiwe n'abandi bahagarikizi bashasha. Mu gihe co kwishusha, iyi mirwi yompi hamwe n'abahagarikizi, bari bambaye udupira twanditseko ngo "turiyamirije amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba", nayo mu bwugamo habaka hariho ivyama vyo kwiyamiriza aka kabi, mbere abakinyi n'abahagarikizi bakaba babanje gupfukama hagati mu kibuga imbere 'yuko urukino rutangura. Webo yari yirukanywe mu kibuga mu gihe ivyo vyaba ariko yahavuye yemererwa kugaruka mu kibuga, maze ikarata itukura yari yahawe irafutwa. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Buraya, UEFA, ririko rirakora amatohoza ku vyabaye. Webo yamaze imyaka umunani akinira imirwi Osasuna na Majorque mw'ihiganwa rya Espagne La Liga.  Avuga ko yashigikiwe n'abantu benshi bo mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru hamwe n'abandi bo hanze. Hagati aho, avuga ko yaronse n'ubutumwa bubi cane buvuye muri Roumanie, igihugu uyo muhagarikizi agira kane,Coltescu, akomokamwo. Ishirahamwe UEFA rivuga ko ryamaze kuronka ivyemezo, ariko ribona ko inyishu idashobora kuboneka imbere ya Noweri (Noël). Nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu bategetsi ba Roumanie, abari bajejwe urwo rukino rwa Champions League barahagaritswe vy'agateganyo mw'ihiganwa ry'igihugu, mu kurindira ko igisata kijejwe indero muri Uefa gifata ingingo.

column2: Burundi: Isabukuru Buja Sans Tabou yahagaritswe kubera "abatimbo bambaye ikoti"
column3: Ubushikiranganji bufise urwaruka mu nshingano zabwo mu Burundi bwahagaritse isabukuru yariko irabera mu gisagara ca Bujumbura kubera umugwi w'abavuzi b'ingomba bambaye umwambaro uzwi nka "costume". Amasanamu yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abatimbo bari bitabiriye isabukuru Buja Sans Tabou, bavuza ingomba bambaye amakoti n'amapantalo na karuvati bashizeko. Bisanzwe bizwi ko mu muco w'ikirundi ingomba zivuzwa n'abantu bambaye umwambaro w'imbega. Ku mbuga hwaniro bamwe baguye mu gahundwe bakagira bati ivyo ni uguta umuco, abandi nabo bati nkumbure ni iterambere, ntawogaya ikitarageragezwa. Ariko mu gihe isabukuru yitwa "Buja Sans Tabou", canke "Buja itagira umuziro" ugenekereke mu kirundi, hari abibajije igituma bobuzwa kwambara uko bashatse naho boba bariko baravuza ingoma z'ikirundi. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'umushikiranganji ajejwe ivy'ishirahamwe ry'akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'umuco ryasohotse uno munsi, uushikiranganji Ezechiel Nibigira amenyesha ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gukingira "Umurage w'Umuco kama w'u Burundi". Yongeye ko yuko vyavuye "ku nyifato yerekanywe itubahirije intambo yubashwe cane y'Umurisho w'Ingoma z'Ikirundi, yigaragaje ku munsi wo kwugurura isabukuru Slam Buja Sans Tabou". Ngo muri iyo sabukuru "abavuzi b'ingomba barihaye uruhusha rwo kwiyereka bambaye 'tenue de ville (costume)' " ku bw'izo mpangu ngo Ubushikiranganji bujejwe ivy'ishirahamwe ry'akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'umuco "buhagaritse ubu nyene ibikorwa vya Buja Sans Tabou". Haraciye imyaka irenga itandatu ingoma z'u Burundi zishizwe ku rutonde rw'umurage w'isi n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe umuco n'inyigisho, UNESCO. Abatunganije iyo sabukuru yagomba kumara iminsi itanu kuva ku tariki 7 gushika ku tariki 11 z'uku kwezi, ntaco barabivugako.

column2: Covid-19: Africa irasaba UN gutegura inama yo kwiga ingene incanco zotangwa ata bugunge
column3: Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Afrika CDC gisaba ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU gutumako inama idasanzwe kugira ngo higwe ingene incanco za Covid-19 zitangwa ata kugunga ibindi bihugu. Umukuru w'iki kigo, Muganga John Nkegasong, avuga ko bafise amakenga ku kungene ibihugu bitunze biriko birakorana n'amahinguriro akora imiti kugira ngo bibe ari vyo vyironkera izi ncanco. Ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza rivuga ko, mu gihe iki kibazo kitokwigwa vuga bwango, ibihugu bikenye  vyokwisanga igice kimwe kw'icumi c'abanyagihugu bavyo ari bo bonyene bashoboye gukingirwa. Mu gihe abajejwe ubuvuzi muri Canada n'Ubwongereza bamaze kwemeza urucanco rwa Pfizer/BioNtech, abahinga mu vyo ubuvuzi babona ko ibi bihugu bitunze biriko vyigungirako incanco. Iri huriro ry'amashirahamwe, ribona ko vyovyo gushika mu mpera za 2021 bizoba vyamaze gucandaga abanyagihugu bavyo bose. Muganga Nkegasong avuga ko bizoba bibabaje cane mu gihe ibi bihugu bitunze bizoba vyitekaniye Afrika nayo iriko iratarataza irondera incanco. Bitegekanijwe ko uyu mugabane ushobora kuronswa incanco zigera ku miriyoni 220 z'incanco biciye mu mugambi mpuzamakungu wiswe  COVAX. Izi ncanco zizotegerezwa gusaranganywa mu bihugu 55 vyose. Hagati aho, hari ababona ko izi zidahagije. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika vyatanguye kwegera aya mahinguriro y'imiti vyo nyene ubwavyo, co kimwe n'ibifise ubucuti bwa hafi n'aya mahinguriro, kugira ngo bishobore kuronswa izo ncanco. Ariko ikigo CDC ca Afrika kibona ko vyoba vyiza ibihugu vyose vya Afrika bigeye hamwe maze bigashobora kwegera aya mahinguriro ari ikintu kimwe, hako buri gihugu kigenda ukwaco. Aya makenga ku kungene izi ncanco ziriko ziratangwa ashizwe ahabona mu gihe ubwandu bw'iki kiza karanda bwiyongereye ku bice 7.8 kw'ijana mu karere ka Afrika yo musi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara mu minsi indwi iheze. Gushika ubu, abarenga imiriyoni 2.3 ku mugabane wose wa Afrika nibo bamaze kwandura Covid-19.

column2: Umunyamuziki Neil Young, yitwariye Trump kubera akoresha umuziki wiwe atabimusavye
column3: Neil Young yitwariye abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Donald Trump ariko yiyamamariza ikindi kiringo kubera bakoresha umuziki wiwe batamusavye uruhusha. Uyo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa rock avuga ko uyo mukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yahonyanze amategeko akingira umuziki mu gukoresha indirimbo ziwe mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Uyo mucuraranzi akomoka muri Canada yanse ko babandanya bakoresha indirimbo ziwe Rockin' in the Free World na Devil's Sidewalk kubera ico yise "isekeza ry'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Trump ntaco barashikiriza kuri ivyo birego. Young yavuze ko yitwariye Bwana Trump amwagiriza ko yakoresheje umuziki wiwe kuva mu 2015, ariko akinumya "n'ibigirankana". Uyo mucuraranzi, ubu afise ubwenegihugu bwa Amerika inyuma yo kuba muri iki gihugu imyaka iharurwa muri za mirongo, arasaba indishi y'amadolari agera ku 150.000 aho hose bagiye bakoresha umuziki wiwe. Aha harimwo ikoraniro rya Trump i Tulsa mu ntara ya Oklahoma mu kwa gatandatu, hamwe n'urugendo Trump yagize kuri Mount Rushmore mu kw'indwi. indirimbo ijanye n'icivugo Muri ino dosiye bashize ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'uyu mucuraranzi, abunganizi ba Young banditse bati: "Uru rubanza ntirufise intumbero yo gusuzugura uburenganzira n'ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu ba Amerika kuko ni uburenganzira bwabo gushigikira umukandida bipfuza". "Hagati aho, nyene kwitwara ntashobora kwemerera ko umuziki wiwe ukoreshwa nk'  'indirimbo y'icivugo' mu ntumbero yo kubiba amacakubiri, 'ingendo y'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Uyu mucuraranzi w'imyaka 74 siwe munyamuziki wenyene ashavuriye Perezida Trump kubera akoresha indirimbo ziwe. Mu kwezi guheze, umurwi The Rolling Stones wo mu Bwongereza waragabishije Perezida Trump ko ashobora kwitwarirwa mu butungane mu gihe yobandanya akoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo yiwe. Abanyamuziki Mick Jagger na Keith Richards baragiye hamwe n'abandi banyamuziki barimwo Aerosmith na Elton John mu gutera igikumu ku rwandiko bandikiye abanyapolitike babahamagarira kubanza gusaba uruhusha imbere y'uko bakoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Ishirahamwe rishinzwe guharanira uburenganzira muvyo umuziki, BMI, rivuga ko impusha zitangwa ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ry'umuziki mu biteramo n'ayandi makoraniro, zitaraba amakoraniro ya politike. Abakora imyiyamamazo ya politike bategerezwa gusaba uruhusha rusabwa n'amashirahamwe ya politike (Political Entities Licence) rubaha uburenganzira bwo gukoresha indirimbo zishika imiliyoni 15. Rero abajejwe imyiyamamazo ba Trump urwo ruhusha ntarwo bafise. Ariko abacuraranzi bafise uburenganzira bwo gukura indirimbo zabo kuri urwo rutonde. The Rolling Stones barabikoze, ariko Young ntatomora nimba nawe yoba yarabikoze.

column2: Akazi: Woshika gute ku bintu vyinshi ukoresheje umwanya muto?
column3: Ukivyumva, bishobora kuba ata nsiguro bifise. Wokora gute umwanya muto kugira uronke umwimbu mwinshi? Aha turabasigurira ingene ivyo bishoboka n'ingene bishobora kubafasha mu migambi imwe imwe. Cal Newport, ikigo c'ubuhinga mu kugwiza umwimbu, kiratanga impanuro ku kungene ushobora akazi ku rwenge. Izo mpanuro harimwo ikintu citwa "gukora udakebaguzwa". Mu gutahura ico ari co gukora udakebaguzwa, birakenewe kumenya ico ari co akazi kadashemeye. Kusoma ubutumwa bwa mail, kuraba imbuga hwaniro, gukoresha amanama ku bintu bitihuta cane, ivyo vyose bishobora gufatwa nk'akazi kadashemeye. Ushobora kutavyirengagiza gose, ariko ushobora kubikura ku rutonde rw'ibintu vyo gukora mu mwanya umwe, kugira wihatire ku kandi kazi udakebaguzwa. N'ukwihatira cane ku bikorwa bikenewe cane no kuvyitondera cane. Ushobora no kwiherera kugira ntusamare. Ni vyo umwanditsi Maya Angelou yakunda gukora, mu gihe umugwizatunga Bill Gates azwi nk'umuntu yakunda kwiyugarana ahantu hiherereye kugira akore. Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gushika ku ntumbero mu buzima. Umugwizatunga Warren Buffet ahanura kugira urutonde rw'ibintu 20 nkenerwa vyo gukora mu buzima, hanyuma ugaca akarongo musi y'ikigira gatanu. Hanyuma, ibindi 15 biri kuri urwo rutonde ivyihoze, gushika ubonye uhejeje ivyo bitanu vya mbere. Umwarimu wa kaminuza Angela Duckworth n'umuhinga muvyo inyifato yateguye indinganizoy'intumbero umuntu yipfuza gushikako. N'ukubigaburamwo ibice vyinshi, ikija hejuru kikaba ari co gekenewe cane (nko kuba umuganga canke gutwara umudari wa olempike). Intera ikurikira irimwo intumbero zito zito zikenewe kugira ushike ku ntumbero nyamukuru. Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bukenewe kugira ukore ibibazo vyotuma uba umunyeshure wa kaminuza muvyo amagara y'abantu, canke imyimenyerezo ikenewe kugira wirukw imetero 100 kugira uronke umudari w'inzahabu. Intera yo hasi irimwo ibikorwa bishigikira ibiri mu ntera yo hejuru, gutyo gutyo gutyo. Mu gihe akazi kamwe katagushikana ku ntumbero nyamukuru, intera iyo ari yo yose kariko, ntugakore. Gukora umusi wose akazi ku muvuduko wa 100km/h si ikintu ciza. Akaruhuko karakenewe, kandi nawe karashobora kugufasha. Francesco Cirillo, umuhinga mu gukoresha neza umwanya, yaratoye igipimo c'akaruhuko ku cuma giharura iminota gifise iforoma y'urutomati yasanze mu gikoni ciwe. Ubwo buhinga buzwi kw'izina rya pomodoro (kivuye mw'izina urutomati mu gitaliyano), bukora mu kugabura akazi kawe mi bice vy'iminota 25. Ugakurikizako iminota 5 y'akaruhuko ifasha mu mwimbu. Sohoka hanze gutembera gato hakuguma uraba imbuga hwaniro - ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko utwo turuhuko dushobora umererwa neza gusumba mu kwitegurira iyindi minota 25 y'akazi. Cal Newport arafise uko afata akazi umuntu adakebaguzwa, ariko arazi kandi kugahagarika no kugira umwanya wiwe. Kugira aheraheze umusi w'akazi, yari afise akamenyero ko guhagarika. N'ukuvuga kumenya ko umusi uheze, kwihweza akazi katashoboye kurangira, gutegura ibizokorwa bukeye, no kugara inyabwonko ngendanwa canke ikaye y'imyimenyerezo no kuvuga ijambo nka "ndaheje kugara burundu". Uko wobivuga kose bikuvako, ariko ayo majambo ategerezwa kwerekana ko uhejeje akazi k'uyo musi n'intango y'akaruhuko, ko widegemvya ushobora kwinezereza. Ako kanya utegerezwa kukaronka! Inkuru yo kuri  BBC Bitesize

column2: Haribonekeza ubukene bwa Amstel ndende na bock mu Burundi
column3: Haraciye igihe mu Burundi hibonekeza ubukene bw'ikinyobwa ca Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock nk'uko abakunzi b'izi nzoga babivuga. Abihereza ivyo binyobwa bavuga ko bisigaye ari umuzi w'ibuye, bikaba ngombwa ko bihereza Primus canke Royal badakunda, canke bakanywa za skol bavuga ko ziva mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, zigurishwa ku giciro kiri hejuru. Umwe ati: "Si benshi bashoboye kwigurira skol kuko zirazimvye". Hampande y'inzoga za Amstel, haranavugwa kandi n'ikena ry'amafanta yo mu bwoko bwa coca. Ikompanyi Brarudi iremera ko izo nyobwa zikenye, ariko ko ikibazo kiri ahanini ku bakiriya b'umurengera muri kino gihe. Aho ni mu gihe hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro. Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi, aremeza ko iyo ngorane iriho ariko ko bakora ibishoboka kugira ngo bayitorere umuti. Ati: "Mu gihe nk'iki, turonka abanywanyi b'umurengera, ariko Brarudi iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ishobore gushimisha abakiriya bayo". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko mu 2015 ubutunzi bw'Uburundi bwagabanutse ku rugero rwa -3.9%, mu 2016 bukagabanuka ku rugero rwa -0.6%, mu 2017, ariko bukaduga kuri 0.5% nayo mu 2018 bukaduga kuri 1,6%. Iyi banki ariko ivuga ko iri duga ryo mu myaka ibiri iheze ari rito cane ugereranyije n'ivyo igihugu gikenera, ikena rikomeye ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ihagarikwa ry'intererano z'amakungu ivyo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku rudandazwa rw'ibiva hanze.

column2: Covid-19: Ubwoko bwayo bwo mu Buhinde bwashitse muri Uganda
column3: Uganda yatangaje ko yagaragayemwo ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bwo mu gihugu c'Ubuhinde, uwuyirwaye akaba ariko aravurwa. Ibipimo vyafashwe kuri uwo muntu itariki 26 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu, akaba ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro vya Mulago National Referral Hospital. Uganda iramaze kugaragaramwo kandi ubwoko bushasha bw'ico kiza bwo muri Nigeria, Ubwongereza na Afrika y'epfo. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa w'ikigo co muri Uganda kijejwe indwara zandukira, Dr. Pontiano Kaleebu, yavuze yuko gushika ubu Uganda imaze kubonekamwo umuntu umwe gusa afise ubwo bwoko bushasha  bwa Covid-19 bwo mu Buhinde. Ubu bwoko bushasha vyemejwe ko bwatowe muri Uganda mu gihe igihugu c'Ubuhinde co muri Aziya bukomakomwo  gihanganye n'umupfunda wa Covid-19 ugira kabiri, umaze gusasika inganda mu miji minini minini. Vyateje ikibazo gikomeye c'amagara mu gihe ibitaro vyaherewe n'ibibanza vyo kwakira abarwayi, gufuba abahasize ubuzima navyo ubu bikaba bibera mu bibanza vy'ahasanzwe hasigwa imiduga (parking). Kaleebu yavuze yuko ubu bagiye kwibanda ku gukumira hamwe no gupima cane  ku mbibe za Uganda. Iki gihugu caratanguje umuce wambere wo gukingira abanyagihugu  Covid-19 mu kwezi kwa gatatu, nyuma yo kuronswa inkingo 864.000 za AstraZeneca zivuye mu mugambi wa Covax, hamwe n'izindi 100.000 zavuye mu Buhinde. Abahereweko gukingirwa mu muce wambere ni abakora akazi gatuma bagira ivyago vyinshi vyo  kwandura barimwo abakora mu vy'amagara y'abantu, abasirikare, abapolisi hamwe n'abigisha. Harimwo kandi n'abafise indwara zituma abasoda b'umubiri bagabanuka, kuva ku myaka 18 kurenga co kimwe n'abakuze cane. Ariko abemera kwikingiza ni bakeyi cane. Abashika 304.000 gusa nibo bamaze kwiteza urukingo rwa mbere gushika ubu. Uganda yatanguye kworosha amategeko ya guma-muhira mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu mwaka uheze, ariko ingingo zo kwikingira nko kwambara agapfuka-munwa hamwe no kutegerana cane, zubahirizwa gake cane.

column2: Theodore McCarrick yahoze ari kardinali muri US arahakana ivyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
column3: Uwahoze ari kardinali wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arahakana ivyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 16 mu myaka ya 1970. Theodore McCarrick, 91, yarengutse imbere ya sentare i Massachusetts kugira yisigure ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu no gukubagura (coups et blessures) yagirizwa ko yakoze mu 1974. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Washington DC azwi ko ari we mutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Amerika yagirijwe ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Imbere y'aho yahora avuga ko atibuka ko hoba hari ivyo guhohotera yoba yarakoze. Mu rubanza rwashinzwe mu kw'indwi, McCarrick yaragirijwe ivyo gukwegakwegera uyo mwana w'umuhungu - ariko atavuzwe izina -  mu buhumbu, mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Uyu mugabo avuga ko yakorewe aya mabi yavuze ko igihe kimwe vyabaye mu gihe yari mu bugeni bwa mwenewabo kuri kaminuza ya Wellesley muri Massachusetts mu 1974. Nyene gukorerwa aya mabi avuga ko McCarrick yamukwegeye mu cumba kimwe co muri iyo kaminuza aca atangura kumukuyakuya. Inyuma yaho, uyo mupatiri avugwa ko yaciye abwira uyu mugabo kuvuga ibisabisho kugira ngo akire "ibicumuro". Muri sentare ku wa gatanu, McCarrick yategetswe kutavugana n'uyu nyene guhohoterwa canke n'umwana n'umwe. Yasabwe gutanga ingwati y'ibihumbi 5000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 28 z'ukw'icumi. Buri caha gishobora guhanishwa umunyororo wo gushika ku myaka itanu, kandi agategerezwa kwandikwa ku nguvu nk'umusambanyi (délinquant sexuel/sex offender) McCarrick ni umwe mu bategetsi ba Ekleziya Katorika bagirizwa gushurashuza abana mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Mu 2019, yarakuwe mu mabanga inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na Vaticano ku vyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu mu myaka itari mike. Yaragirijwe kandi ko yafashe ku nguvu umuyabaga i New York hagati mu myaka ya 1970, yongera ahatira abagabo kuryamana nawe mu rugo i New Jersey mu gihe bariko bigira ubupatiri. Icegeranyo c'impapuro 450 ca Vaticano casanze Papa Yohani Paulo wa kabiri yarabwiwe ivyerekeye ibi vyagirizwa McCarrick, ariko agahitamwo kwizera abepiskopi ba Amerika bamukingiye ikibaba. Casanze kandi Papa Benoit/Benedict XVI - yatanze imihoho mu 2013 - ashobora kuba yaranse iciyumviro co gukora amatohoza kubera ata "vyemezo vyari bihari" ku vyo yagirizwa.

column2: DR Congo: Ekleziya Gatorika isaba abapatiri bavyaye kuva mu mabanga
column3: Urwandiko rw'Inama y'Abepiskopi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, CENCO, rwanyereye rugashika mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru rusaba abapatiri bo muri Congo bavyaye abana gutanga imihoho mu mabanga yabo y'ubusaserdoti, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru RFI. Inama y'abepiskopi CENCO, itegeka ko kizira y'uko abapatiri barangura amabanga y'abubatse. Urwo rwandiko rusohotse mu gihe Papa Francis yimirije kugendera Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo muri Mukakaro (7) uyu mwaka. Muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 19 rwiswe "A l'école de Jésus-Christ. Pour une vie sacerdotale authentique" (ni ukuvuga: Kw'ishure rya Yezu/Yesu Kristu/Kristo. Ubuzima nyabwo bw'ukwihebera Imana), abasenyeri bavuga ko ubuzima bw'igipatiri budashobora kubangikanwa n'ubuzima bw'ukuba serugo. CENCO isaba uwihebeye Imana uwo ari we wese afise umwana "gusaba uruhusha Papa rwo kuva muri ayo mabanga", nk'uko bisubirwamwo na RFI. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko mu gihe hogira abihebeye Imana bovyanka, musenyeri ashobora kwitura Vaticano kugira ngo ifate ibihano vyo ku rwego rwa nyuma, ibi bigasigura kwirukanwa burundi muri Ekleziya. Hari igice kimwe muri uru rwandiko rwa CENCO kivuga ibijanye n'abana b'aba bapatiri hamwe na ba nyina babo. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi ivuga ko ishaka "gushira ibintu ahabona" ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze kuri bo, ikibutsa ko muri rusangi usanga "banenwa mu kibano". Ico gice kigira kiti: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima".i: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima". Ikibazo c'abihebeye Imana bavyara abana muri Ekleziya Gatorika ni ikibazo giteje impari no mu bindi bihugu vy'akarere no kw'isi. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze uwari Musenyeri mukuru wa Paris, Musenyeri Michel Aupetit, yasavye imbabazi aca atanga n'imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera "umubano udasanzwe n'umugore". Ico gihe kandi, Patiri Wenceslas Munyeshyaka w'umunyarwanda, yahagaritswe ku kuba padiri wa paruwasi ya Brionne mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko bimenyekanye ko yemeye mu nzego z'ubutegetsi ko ari se w'umuhungu yavutse mu kw'indwi 2010.

column2: Brexit: Boris Johnson arashima amasezerano y'ubudandaji hagati ya UK na EU
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, n'Ubwongereza bashitse ku masezerano azogenga ubudandaji inyuma ya Brexit, aje kurangiza amezi yo kutumvikana ku burenganzira bwo kuroba n'amategeko agenga ubudandaji. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku biro iwe, Boris Johnson yagize ati:"Twasubiranye ubwigenge ku mategeko yaco hamwe na kazoza kacu." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yongeyeko ko, n'aho ibiganiro "vyari bigoye" ari "amasezerano meza ku Buraya bwose" azotanga akazi n'iterambere. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Buraya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko ari amasezerano "ata ho yegamiye". Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru I Bruxelles, umukuru w'akanama k'ubumwe bwa Buraya yavuze ati:"Rwari urugendo rurerure rurimwo ibihuhusi ariko twaronse amasezerano meza twerekana. "Ni nyayo, nta ho yegamiye, kandi n'ikintu ciza cari gikwiriye gukorwa ku mpande zose." Yongeyeko ko ubu ari "igihe co kwibagira kahise tukaraba muri kazoza" kandi ko Ubwongereza "buguma ari ncuti nyakuri". Yavuze ko hazoba ikiringo mfatakibanza c'imyaka itanu n'igice mu bakora mu gisata c'uburovyi. Hanyuma imigenderanire izobandanya ku bibazo bijanye n'ihindukagurika ry'ibihe, amasoko ntanganguvu, umutekano hamwe no mu gutwara abantu n'ibintu. Mw'itangazo, ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere mu Bwongereza bigira biti:"Turagarukanye amahera yacu, imbibe, amategeko, ubudandaji hamwe n'amazi turobamwo," Risubiramwo icivugo ca Johnson co kwiyamamaza mu matora, ryongeyeko  "Brexit iragiye mu bikorwa". Johnson yashize kuri Twitter ifoto yiwe ariko aramwenyura, yashize intoke z'ibikumu hejuru. Mu kiganiro yatanze, yavuze:"Turarangije amasezerano akomeye aciye imiriyaridi 668 y'amapawundi ku mwaka. "Amasezerano yumvikana ameze nk'aya Canada hagati y'Ubwongereza na EU. Amasezerano azokingira ubuzi muri iki  gihugu cose, azotuma ibidandazwa vyo mu Bwongereza bigurishwa ata makori, ata n'ibice bitanzwe kw'isoko rya Buraya. "Amasezerano azoha uburenganzira amakompanyi gukorana n'ibihugu vy'incuti vy'i Buraya."

column2: USA-Iran: Amerika ‘yiteguye kuja mu biganiro nyavyo’ na Irani ata kirinze gusabwa
column3: Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko "ziteguye kuja mu biganiro vyo nyavyo na Irani atakirinze gusabwa"inyuma y'aho ivyo bihugu bishamiraniye. Mw'ikete yandikiye ishirahamwe ONU,  Amerika isigura ko igandagurwa rya Jenerali Qasem Soleimani ryabaye mu buryo bwo kwivuna. Irani yarihoye mu kurasa ibisasu vya misire ku birindiro vy'abasirikare ba Amerika muri Iraq ariko ntawe vyahitanye. Nayo nyene yabwiye ONU ko yakoze ico gitero mu buryo bwo kwivuna. Jenerali Soleimani yaboneka ko ari we mutegetsi agira ubwa kabiri mu gihugu. Nk'umukuru w'ingabo zidasanzwe, Quds, zo mu gisata ca gisirikare kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu (Iranian Revolutionary Guards'), politike ya Irani mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati yari ihagaze kuri we. Mw'iryo kete ryarungikiye Inama Nkuru y'umutekano y'ishirahamwe ONU, uwuserukira Amerika muri ONU Kelly Craft , avuga ko Amerika yiteguye kuganira "mu ntumbero yo kubuza Irani ko ihungabanya amahoro n'umutekano vy'isi". Rivuga kandi ko Amerika izofata n'izindi ngingo "mu gihe vyokenerwa" mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati kugira ngo ikingire abakozi bayo n'inyungu zayo. Hagati aho, uwuserukira Irani muri ONU, Majid Takht Ravanchi, avuga ko ata muntu yokwemera ivyo ibiganiro bivugwa na Amerika, mu gihe ibandanya ifatira Irani ibihano ruhasha mu vyerekeye ubutunzi. Bwana Trump yarigeze kumenyesha ko yipfuza kuganira na Irani atakirinze gusabwa - mbere ko yobonana na Perezida Hassan Rouhani. Mu kwezi kw'icenda guheze, Ayatollah Khamenei  yavuze ko Irani itarota ija mu biganiro na Amerika, akavuga ko ari uburyo bwayo bwo kurondera "gushira igitutu kuri Irani". Ayatollah Khamenei avuga ko, mu gihe Amerika yosubira mu masezerano yivumbuyemwo mu 2018 yerekeye umugambi wa Irani w'uguhingura ubutare bw'ubumara, Irani ishobora kuja mu biganiro bishobora kuyihuza n'ibindi bihugu vyose biri muri ayo masezerano. Mw'ikete rya Irani, Bwana Ravanchi yanditse avuga ko Irani "idashaka intambara" inyuma y'aho ikoreye igitero co kwivuna ku kirindiro c'ingabo za Amerika. Yanditse ati: "Ico gitero cakozwe uko categuwe kandi gikorwa ku birindiro vya gisirikare, ari naco gituma ata banyagihugu basanzwe bahasize ubuzima, eka n'inyungu zabo zikaba ataco zabaye mu karere". Inyuma y'ico gitero ca Irani, Perezida Trump avuga ko Irani isa n'iyahesheje. Mark Esper   avuga ko Irani yateye ibisasu vya misire 16, aho 11 vyaguye ku kirindiro ca Al Asad, ikindi kikagwa ku kirindiro ca Irbil. Avuga ko ibindi vyaguye kure y'aho vyategerezwa kugwa.

column2: Umukenyezi w'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Lesotho yatawe muri yompi
column3: Igipolisi camenyesheje ko umukenyezi Thabane  azosomerwa ivyaha yagirizwa na Sentare nkuru  kuri uyu wa gatatu. Hari haheze hafi ukwezi yarahunze, yinyegeje mu gihugu kibanyi ca Afrika y'epho, akaba yafashwe n'igipolisi  kuri uyu wa kabiri avuhe mu gisagara ca Maseru. Vyitezwe ko Maesiah Thabane amara ijoro rya mbere mw'ibohero inyuma yo guhatwa ibibazo bijanye n'urupfu rw'uwahoze ari umugore w'umukuru w'igihugu ariko  bahukanye. Umuyobozi mukuru w'igipolisi Holomo Molibeli  yabwiye BBC ko uyo mukenyezi  azokwitaba sentare nkuru ku musi wa gatatu, asomerwe  ivyaha yagirizwa ku rupfu rw'uwo mukenyezi mu 2017. Umukenyezi Lipolelo Thabane yagiranye ibibazo bijanye no kwahukana n'umushikiranganji wa mbere Thomas Thabane. Yarasiwe hafi y'urugo rwiwe  imisi ibiri gusa, imbere y'uko haba ibirori vy'ukwimika Thomas Thabane nk'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Amakuru ajanye n'ukwagiriza Maesiah Thabane  mu rupfu rw'uyo mukenyezi yari inkuru ikomeye mu kwezi guheze - aho benshi batangajwe no kubona yaciye ahunga. Ikindi catangaje ni ukubon vyasa nk'uko umugabo wiwe yari afise uruhara muri urwo rupfu rubabaje, ariko ntagire ico abivugako. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba umkenyezi wa Thabane azosaba kurekurwa vy'agateganyo niyitaba sentare, ariko igipolisi kiza cavuze ko kitazobimwemerera, kuko cemeza ko ashobora gufata indege agahunga.

column2: Afrika yasezeye ihiganwa mpuzamakunu ry’igikombe c'umupira w’amaguru rihuza imirwi y’abagore
column3: Ibihugu vya Nijeriya na Kameruni vyari bisigaye mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abagore vyasezeye iryo higanwa inyuma y'aho bitsindiwe mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma. Nijeriya yatsinzwe ibitsindo bitatu n'umurwi w'Ubudagi mu rukino rwahuje iyo mirwi ku munsi wa gatandatu, aho vyabonetse ko Nijeriya yarushijwe. Igitsindo ca mbere cinjijwe n'umukinyi Alexandra Popp ku munota wa 20 ku mupira wari uterewe mu mfuruka z'ikibuga. Inyuma y'iminota itarenga itandatu, Nijeriya yari itsinzwe ica kabiri ku mupira waterewe ku metero 11, bivuye kw'ikosa umukinyi  Evelyn Nwabuoku wa Nijeriya yakoreye umudagi Lina Magull muri ca gice ca mukorumbone, ikosa ryagiye kuboneka hakoreshejwe bwa buhinga bwa videwo bufasha umuhagarikizi (VAR). Mu gice ca kabiri, Nijeriya yaragerageje kurondera gutsinda ariko biranka, niho ku munota wa 82 umukinyi Lea Schuller w'Ubudagi yatsinda igitsindo ca gatatu bivuye ku bakinyi b'inyuma ba Nijeriya bahanye umupira nabi. Eka na Kameruni ibintu ntivyoroshe, aho ubwo buhinga bwa VAR bwakoreshejwe  mu kwemeza igitsindo ca kabiri c'Ubwongereza, ariko kandi bukoreshwa mu guhakana igitsindo ca Kameruni. Inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'Ubwongereza Steph Houghton atsindiye igitsindo ca mbere ku munota wa 14, Kameruni yagerageje gusatira kugira ngo ikigombore, ariko biranka. Ku munota wa nyuma w'igice ca mbere, umukinyi Ellen White yatsinze igitsindo ca kabiri c'Ubwongereza cagiye kwemezwa habanje gukoreshwa bwa buhinga bwa videwo, kuko cari cabanje guhakanwa yiketswe ko yari yaraririye. Mu gice ca kabiri Kameruni yaje ifise ishaka ryo kurondera ibitsindo, mbere ku munota wa gatatu gusa w'igice ca kabiri, umukinyi Ajara Nchout yari yinjije igitsindo, ariko cagiye guhakanwa inyuma y'uko hakoreshejwe VAR bagasanga yari yaraririye. Abakinyi ba Kameruni barerekanye agashavu kabo ku ngingo zagiye zifatwa n'umuhagarikizi, bakavuga ko barenganijwe, mbere bakaba barashatse no kwanka gukina incuro zibiri zose. Iyo nyifato ikaba itanezereje umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza, Phil Neville, avuga ko abakinyi biwe bigenjeje neza. Mu rundi rukino, igihugu ca Brezili naco nyene caraye gisezeye iryo higanwa inyuma y'aho gitsindiwe n'Ubuifaransa ibitsindo bibiri kuri kimwe. Rwari urukino rutari rworoshe kuko  iminota 90 yose yagiye kurangira iyo mirwi inganije igitsindo kimwe kuri kimwe, bica biba ngombwa ko bongera ya minota 30. Ku munota ugira 106, niho umukinyi Amandine Henri yadadanura ibintu, mu gutsinda igitsindo catumye Ubufaransa bubandanya iryo higanwa, Brezili nayo igasezererwa. Mu nkino zitegekanijwe kuri uyu wa mbere, Espanye iza gutana mu mitwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, isaha cumi na zibiri (18h),  Suwede nayo ihure na Kanada isaha zitatu z'ijoro, ni mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda.

column2: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
column3: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.

column2: Lionel Messi yaraye anganije na Pele ku gitsindo ca 643 atsindiye muri Barcelona
column3: Lionel Messi yaraye yinjije igitsindo catumye anganya n'uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brezili Pele ku bitsindo 643 mu murwi umwe gusa, igitsindo yinjirije Barcelona ejo ku wa gatandatu mu rukino rwarangiye uyu murwi unganya na Valencia ku bitsindo 2-2. Uyu musatirizi wa Argentine w'imyaka 33 yashitse kuri iyi ntambwe ku gitsindo yinjije n'umutwe imbere y'uko igice ca mbere kirangira, haciye akanya isase umunyegori Jaume Domenech wa Valencia akuyemwo penalty yiwe. Messi yinjije igitsindo ciwe ca mbere muri Barcelona mu mwaka wa 2005 igihe uyu murwi wariko ukina na Albacete. Pele yinjirije umurwi wa Brezili Santos ibitsindo 643 mu myaka y'inkino 19  hagati ya 1956 na 1974. Ariko rero ikibabaje kuri Messi, uwu munezero wari uvanze n'umubabaro kuko Barcelona yananiwe no gutsinda uyu murwi bari bahanganye. Ibi vyatumye uyu murwi umaze gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espagne La Liga incuro 26 zose urangiza urukino uri mu kibanza ca gatanu, ukaba uri inyuma ku manota umunani yose usumbwa na Atletico Madrid uri mu kibanza ca mbere, inyuma yo kwirahira Elche ku bitsindio 3-1. Umukeba wayo ruhebwa Real Madrid ari nayo ifise igikombe c'iri higanwa, isumvya Barcelona amanota atanu, ariko ikaba yiteze guhura na Eibar kuri uyu wa Mungu. Barcelona yabanje gukorwa mu maso ku munota wa 29 igihe umukinyi w'inyuma Mouctar Diakhaby abaciriye mu ryahumye akinjiriza Valencia igitsindo ca mbere ku mupira wari uterewe mu mfuruka z'ilkibuga. Valencia yabandanije ikingira urugo rwayo gushika mu minota yanyuma y'igice ca mbere aho Barca ironkeye penalty bigaragaye ko umukinyi Jose Gaya yasunitse Antoine Griezmann muri ca gice ca mukore umbone. Hagati aho, vyabaye ngombwa ko umuhagarikizi Alejandro Hernandez yifashisha bwa buhinga bwa videwo imbere y'uko yemeza ko koko habaye ikosa, maze Messi aca aja gutera uwu mupira wari kumwandikishiriza amateka. Ibi ntivyabaye muri ako kanya kuko umunyegori Domenech yari yahumaganye, akurayo iyo penalty. vyabaye ngombwa ko Messi arindira amasegonda makeya kugira ngo ashikie ku ntego yiwe, mu kwinjiza iki gitsindo mu minota imbere y'uko ifirimbi yo kurangiza igice ca mbere ivuga. Barcelona yariyongeye ica kabiri mu gice ca kabiri nyene, ku munota wa 52,cinjijwe ku buhinga bukomeye n'umukinyi wa Uruguay Ronald Araujo. Aba bakinyi ba Ronald Koeman babandanije basatira bikomeye kugira ngo barabe ko bokwiyambura Valencia, ariko rero ibintu vyagiye kwononekara ku mupira w'umuvuduko (contre-attaque) wa Valencia, watumye Maximiliano Gomez Gonzalez yinjiza igitsindo ca kabiri, ku munota wa 69,  gutyo baba baranganije 2-2, urukino rurinda rurangira ari uko.

column2: Coronavirus: Ubushinwa buhimiriza imiti kama mu kuvura ako karanda
column3: Mu gihe abahinga bari mu ntambara yo kurondera urucanco rwa Covid-19, Ubushinwa bubandanya bushira imbere imiti kama izwi kw'izina rya TCM nk'uburyo bwo kuvura iyo ndwara. Urwandiko ruherutse gusohorwa na leta y'Ubushinwa ruvuga ko ibice 92% vy'abanduye Covid-19 muri ico gihugu bavuwe hakoreshejwe iyo miti. TCM ni imiti imaze igihe kirekire cane ikaba igizwe n'ivyatsi bivangwa bikavugutwa hamwe n'iyindi yo kwirasaga yakunzwe gukoreshwa na Tai Chi. Ni imiti izwi cane mu Bushinwa kuva imyaka n'imyaka, n'aho rimwe na rimwe vyashika hakaba impari zikomeye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ryayo. Abahinga bavuga ko Ubushinwa buriko burondera gukwiragiza iyo miti haba mu gihugu hagati canke hanze, ariko abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu bagumana impungenge ku bijanye n'ubushobozi bwayo bwo kuvura. Mu mategeko ngenderwako ajanye no guhangana na coronavirus, umurwi w'igihugu ujejwe amagara y'abantu warashizemwo ikigabane cerekana ikoreshwa ry'iyo miti, mu gihe ibinyamakuru vya leta bimaze igihe vyerekana uruhara rwayo mu kuvura indwara z'ivyaduka muri kahise, nk'akarorero ikiza ca SARS mu 2003. Hari imiti kama ishika ku ndwi yamamajwe cane nk'imiti ya Covid-19, ibiri muri yo yabaye rurangiranwa ikaba yitwa Lianhua Qingwen - umuvango w'ubwoko 13 bw'ivyatsi bizwi nka forsythia suspense na rhodiola rose - hamwe na Jinhua Qinggan - wakozwe mu gihe c'indwara y'icaduka H1N1 yo mu 2009, ukaba ugizwe n'ubwoko 12 bw'ivyatsi. Abashigikiye ikoreshwa ry'iyo miti bavuga ko ata ngorane uyikoresheje agira, ariko abahinga bavuga ko hakenewe gukorwa ivyigwa vyo kugerageza iyo miti imbere y'uko yemerwa ko ari iyo ukuri. Ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Amerika kivuga ko ari vyo ko iyo miti ishobora gupfupfahaza mu kugabanya ububabare kanaka, ariko ko ibijanye n'uko iyo miti ivura coronavirus bitaremezwa. Edzard Ernst, umushakashatsi w'umukukuruke mu bijanye n'imiti, yasubiwemwo amajambo n'ikinyamakuru Nature c'ubushakashatsi ati: "Kuri iyo miti kama, nta cemezo na kimwe co kuyizera gihari, rero uretse ko ikoreshwa ryayo ritemejwe, rifise ingaruka mbi cane". Hagati aho, urugero rw'ikoreshwa ry'iyo miti ruriko rwiyongera cane mu Bushinwa, kandi no kw'isi iriko iraronderwa. Mu mwaka uheze, ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu mu Bushinwa vyavuze ko gushika mu mpera za 2020 imiti kama ishobora kuzoba yinjirije ico gihugu imiliyaridi 420 z'amadorari. Perezida Xi avugwa ko "ashigikiye bikomeye" uwo mugirwa wo muri kahise avuga ko "ari itunga rya kahise k'Ubushinwa". Ariko, Yanzhong Huang, umushakashatsi mukuru muvyo amagara y'abantu mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire, amenyesha ko "igisata c'imiti kama kiriko gihura n'ibibazo bijanye n'umutekano n'inguvu z'iyo miti, kandi ko Abashinwa hafi bose bipfuza imiti ya none gusumba imiti kama". Mu mwaka uheze, ibipimo vyakozwe kuri yo n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe kwihweza imfungurwa n'imiti casanze harimwo isumu. N'aho Ubushinwa bubandanya utwigoro two gukwiragiza iyo miti kw'isi, abantu benshi hanze y'ico gihugu ntayo bazi. Abanegura ico gihugu bacagiriza ko kiriko gikoresha coronavirus nk'inzira yo gukwiragiza iyo miti mu mahanga - ikirego camye ciyamirizwa mu binyamakuru vya leta. Hagati aho, Ubushinwa bubandanya bukwiragiza iyo miti hamwe n'abahinga bayo hampande y'imiti n'ibikoresho burungika muri Afrika, Aziya yo hagati hamwe n'i Bulaya. Yu Yanhong, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe ikoreshwa ry'imiti kama y'u Bushinwa, mu kwa gatatu yavuze ati: "Turipfuza gusangiza 'ubuhinga dufise' mu kuvura Covid-19, kandi n'ibihugu vyinshi bikamenya, bigatahura kandi bigakoresha imiti kama y'Ubushinwa". Bwana Huang abona ko uguhimiriza ikoreshwa ry'imiti kama y'Ubushinwa hanze bitumwa n'ugushaka kugira inguvu mu makungu. Avuga ati: "Imvugo y'uko imiti kama y'Ubushinwa ivura Covid-19 ifasha kandi kwerekana ko uburyo Ubushinwa bwakoresheje mu kurwanya Covid ari bwo bufise inguvu, mu gihe uburyo bukoreshwa n'ibihugu vyo mu burengero busa n'ubwananiwe no kuzibira uwo mugera". Mu mwaka uheze, imiti kama yarateye intambwe cane inyuma y'aho ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, riyemereye inyuma y'imyaka itari mike Ubushinwa busaba ko yokwemerwa - ingingo yiyamirijwe n'umuryango w'abavuzi kw'isi. Mu nyuma, OMS yongeye kwishira mu bibazo bindi inyuma y'aho ikuriye ku rubuga rwayo amajambo yari mu congereza no mu gishinwa yagabisha kw'ikoreshwa ry'imiti kama mu kuvuga Covid-19. Ikiriho ni uko kubona ata vyigwa vyakozwe kuri iyo miti kama bijanye n'ubushobozi bwo kuvura vyatumye idashobora kwakirwa cane. Mu kwa gatanu, abategetsi ba Suwede barapimye urya muti wa Lianhua Qingwen basanga hari vyinshi biburamwo.

column2: Kardinari w'i Vatican Becciu mu rubanza rwo kunyonyeza miriyoni 412 z'ama dorari
column3: Umukardinari  w'ishengero Katorika yigeze kuba akorana hafi cane na Papa François agiye gucirirwa urubanza i Vaticano, yagirizwa gukoresha nabi amafaranga y'ishengero mu kamaramaza kahombesheje amafaranga menshi mu mugambi wo kugura inyubakwa i Londres/London. Kardinari Angelo Becciu, w'imyaka 73, niwe mwubahwa  akomeye cane mu barongoye Ekereziya Katorika  mu bihe vya none agiye imbere y'ubucamanza  kubera gukekwako ivyaha bijanye n'amafaranga. Yagirizwa gusohora amafaranga y'amanyaburaya, Euro, angana na miriyoni 350 (arenga miriyaridi 800 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) y'ishengero mu mugambi utagenze neza  wo kugura inyubakwa  muri Chelsea watumye hatakara amafaranga menshi cane. Arahakana kuba hari icaha yakoze. Abandi bantu icenda bakurukiranwa muri urwo rubanza nabo bagirizwa ivvyaha birimwo kuronka amafaranga ku nguvu canke kw'iterabwoba, kunyuruza no gukoresha nabi ububasha bw'akazi. Kardinari Becciu yirukanywe mu kazi na Papa François mu kwezi kw'icenda igihe amakuru y'ugukoresha nabi amafaranga yaja ahabona. Amatohoza yamaze imyaka ibiri yerekanye ingene Vaticano yatakaje miriyoni z'ama euro, arimwo amashikanwa, inyuma yo kugura inyubakwa  yahora ari ububiko bwa Harrods kuri Sloane Square  Avenue muri Chelsea, mu 2014. Uwo mukardinari yahora  araba amashikanwa mu biro bijejwe amafaranga ya  Vaticano. Ivyaha akurikiranwako birimwo kurungika amafaranga mu rudandazwa rwari rurongowe n'abavukanyi biwe mu ntara y'amavukiro yabo muri Sardaigne. Urwo rubanza rwitezwe kumara amezi menshi. Intahe zibiri zizosasa muri iyi ndwi - ku bibazo  vy'ubuhinga - zishobora kwungururizwa mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abandi icenda bagirizwa barimwo: Abagirizwa bose barahakana kuba barakoze icaha. Hamwe bokwagirwa n'ivyaha, bashobora guhanishwa umunyororo canke ihadabu, canke vyompi. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko umuranzi  akorera Londres, Gianluigi Torzi,  yanyonyeje Vaticano mu gukoresha amafaranga yayo mu kugura imitahe yo muri iyo nyubakwa yo muri Chelsea yari guca isubirwawo ngo ivemwo amazu y'agaciro yo kubamwo. Torzi avuga ko ibivugwa bishingiye ku kwumva ibintu ukutariko. Ubutariyano buriko buragerageza ngo burabe ko  Ubwongereza bumubarungikira. Mu kwezi kwa kane Papa yafashe ingingo ko aba kardinari n'abepiskopi bagirijwe ivyaha bashobora gukurikiranwa n'abacamanza basanzwe - aho gucirirwa imanza n'aba kardinari nk'uko vyahora. Umukuru mushasha ajejwe amafaranga muri Vaticano, Juan Antonio Guerrero, avuga ko Vaticano iriko irashiramwo inguvu zitari bwigere ziboneka kugira ikorere ku mugaragaro mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Ku wa 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, ku ncuro ya mbere Vaticano yashize ahabona ido n'ido ry'imitahe yayo: amazu 4.051 mu Butariyano n'izishika 1.120 i Londres, Paris, Geneve  na Lausane. Furera Guerreo yagize ati: ''Twamenyereye gukorera mw'ibanga, ariko twamenye ko mu vyerekeye ubutunzi, gukorera ku mugaragaro bidukingira kurusha gukorera nw'ibanga."

column2: Misire yo gucungera ikirere ya Syria yaguye hafi y'ikigo ca nikleyeri ca Israel
column3: Igisasu ca misire gikorora indege ca Syria caturikiye mu bumanuko bwa Israel, ku birometero 30 gusa uvuye ku kigo c'ibanga ca nucléaire. Amahona yo gutabaza (sirènes) yatanguye kwumvikana imbere y'uko ico gisasu giturika mu karere ka Dimona. Nta wakomeretse kandi nta vyononekaye. Igisirikare ca Israel kivuga ko iyi misire ari imwe mu yandi atari make yatewe imbere y'aho ku ndege ya Israel. Nayo yaciye yihora mu gutera ibirindiro bitari bike muri Syria vyo gucungera ikirere. Igisirikare ca Syria kimenyesha ko izo misire za Israel zaguye hafi y'ibigo biri hafi y'umugwa mukuru Damas/Damascus. Igisirikare ca Syria kivuga kandi ko nyinshi muri izo misire zategerewe mu kirere zikamanurwa, ariko ko abasirikare bane bakomeretse, kandi ko hari "ibintu bimwe bimwe vyononekaye". Ishirahamwe rikurikiranira hagufi ibijanye n'agateka ka muntu muri Syria, Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, rifise icicaro mu Bwongereza, rivuga ko misire za Israel zatewe ku kirindiro co gucungera ikirere mu gisagara ca Dumayr kiri ku birometero 40 mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Damas. Ako karere kazwi ko ari bwo bubiko bw'ibirwanisho vy'abarwanyi bashigikiwe na Iran basanzwe barwana ku ruhande rw'igisirikare ca reta ya Syria mu ntambara iri muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, hari amakuru yavuga ko ibirindiro vyo gucungera ikirere vya Israel biri hafi ya Dimona hamwe no ku kivuko ca Eilat kiri ku kiyaga gitukura (Red Sea) vyongerejwe inguvu mu kwicungera mu gihe hoba igitero c'abarwanyi bashigikiwe na Iran muri ako karere, harimwo n'abari muri Syria. Icuka kibandanya kiba kibi hagati y'ibi bihugu bisanzwe birabana ribi, Iran ikagiriza Israel ko ari yo iherutse gukora igitero ku kigo ca Natanz gihingura ubutare bwa uranium mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Israel ntiyigeze ivuga ko ari yo yakoze ico gitero. Ikigo ca nucléaire ca Dimona muri Israel  kivugwa ko cahinguye ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Israel ntihakana canke ngo yemeze ko ifise ibirwanisho vy'ubumara.
